plot: No distance is too far for the best bounty hunters in the nation as Leonard Padilla and Rob Dick travel to Guam to capture a fugitive who has been on the run for nearly a year.
title: National Geographic Inside: Trouble in Paradise
plot_es: No distance is too far for the best bounty hunters in the nation as Leonard Padilla and Rob Dick travel to Guam to capture a fugitive who has been on the run for nearly a year.
original_name: National Geographic Inside: Trouble in Paradise
plot_en: No distance is too far for the best bounty hunters in the nation as Leonard Padilla and Rob Dick travel to Guam to capture a fugitive who has been on the run for nearly a year.
